title: Toster
body:
Welcome, where you are going?
[[We're trying to get out of this house|Toster1]]
[[we are looking for plastic household devices, are you coming with us?|Toster2]]

title: Toster1
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
You can not do this, you are the homeowners' property
[[It's easy for you, you're made of steel, you do not pollute the environment|Toster11]]
[[You're right, but we're outdated. They will get rid of us|Toster12]]

title: Toster2
body:
No, I'm made of steel
So what are you doing?
[[we're going to run away from home|Toster21]]

title: Toster11
body:
It does not change anything, and you will stay here
None of us should leave this house
Not of own will
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: Toster21
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
You stay at home
You can not get out of here!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>
